articles.title: V Ramaswamy Quits Presidential Race, Endorses Trump After Iowa Caucuses Win - NDTV
articles.description: US Presidential Elections 2024: Indian-American businessman Vivek Ramaswamy today announced his withdrawal from the 2024 US presidential race following a lacklustre performance in the Iowa Republican caucuses.
articles.content:
US Presidential Elections 2024: In Iowa, Mr Ramaswamy finished fourth, securing around 7.7% of the votes.
New Delhi: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, dropped out of the 2024 US presiden… [+1848 chars]

articles.title: Arctic blast grips much of U.S. bringing brutal temperatures and dangerous wind chills - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: The same deep freeze that's put Iowa on ice has millions of other Americans in its grip as well. Most of the country shivered through a long day of power out...
